body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gerald Alexander and the customer's name is Maria Clark.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Sarah, and I am an agent with Tech Solutions.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! May I ask your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's john.smith at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Lastly, may I have your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's four zero zero two, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I have noted that down. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that should be all. Thank you for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, John. Have a wonderful day!
